session_summary: 4-agent mode sync complete: inbox cleaned, onboarding Batch 4 architecture review performed, and Agent-2 is ready for next-cycle assignments. Core architecture/design validations remain green (584/584 tests across cycles); deployment/Monitoring SSOT remain open items.

inbox_cleanup.description: Agent-2 inbox reviewed and cleaned; historical CAPTAIN and A2A coordination messages summarized and archived into processed_2025-12-15. New status update file created to document readiness for 4-agent mode.

onboarding_batch4_arch_review.description: Reviewed hard/soft onboarding services and onboarding helpers; validated thin-shim pattern over helper modules, confirmed public APIs locked in by tests, and identified duplication regression in HardOnboardingService instructions block for future cleanup. Created architecture documentation: docs/architecture/ONBOARDING_SERVICES.md documenting service shims, helper modules, public APIs, and design pattern.

architecture_validation.description: Architecture/design domain remains fully green across cycles (584/584 tests passing including ManagerContext, contract serialization, registry discovery, performance, config SSOT, file locking, and engines).

phase6_consolidation.description: Phase 6A manager/domain consolidation continues. Execution/Resource/Lifecycle SSOTs created previously; Monitoring domain SSOT still pending design and implementation.

deployment_timing.description: Awaiting Agent-1 timing window to push FreeRideInvestor + Prismblossom via WordPress/SFTP (4 FRI + 1 PB files).

ssot_tagging.description: Architecture SSOT tagging at ~39% (358/919); continuing tagging of core + Discord infrastructure files in short sprints using stall-guard mindset.

tools_created: Stall Resumer Guard (is_resumer_prompt, is_meaningful_progress) for autonomous stall recovery (previous session)
session_cleanup_helper (template generator for passdown/devlog/Swarm Brain entries, created previously)

onboarding_architecture_reporter.py - Generates concise summary of onboarding module structure, validates V2 compliance, checks shim pattern delegations, and documents public APIs. Created 2025-12-15.
lessons_learned: Keep onboarding services as thin orchestration layers over helper modules to stay V2-compliant.
Inbox cleanup before new work reduces coordination overhead and makes 4-agent mode smoother.
Session cleanup artifacts (passdown, devlog, Swarm Brain) should be treated as part of the work, not an afterthought.
